website_summaries.verdict: This Pioneer radio features impressive design with numerous functions.
pros: Single-DIN radio includes a remote control
Features hands-free calling and audio streaming, USB connect, and CD play
It's also SiriusXM ready when you purchase your subscription
cons: Some found the user manual hard to understand

website_summaries.verdict: Pioneer has a reputation for top-notch technology that creates great sound, and this marine stereo is an example of the brand's quality.
pros: Superior sound and features by a name known for excellence in stereo equipment
Compatible with top music streaming services
Has HD radio and remote control
cons: Confusing to set up and program, and manual lacks details
Display can be difficult to see in bright light

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but probably not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Installed into a 2002 Jeep TJ. Works fine, nothing special at all. Easy install. Some menu weirdness. Somehow my wife managed to turn off the rear speakers just from trying to navigate the menu. The only way to do this is to go into the alternate menu that is only accessible when the unit is off. Makes no sense at all. The USB connector rusted out within a year in the Hawaii humidity. Seems like they could have used higher quality materials on the USB port. The face plate connector also rusted. Sometimes the stereo cuts out from the weak connection. You have to push and jerk on the face to make it work again.
customer_reviews.author: brandonjlacy

customer_reviews.title: The alerts make me want to throw it out the window
customer_reviews.text: Almost every day, I get safety alerts every 2 minutes and it interrupts my music listening experience. It is a HORRIBLE feature with NO off switch. It is bad enough to the point where I would rather listen to a baby screech in my ear while I drive my car. This was by far the worst use of my money in the past couple of years. Oh an the screen is really dim like other people have been complaining about.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Balis

customer_reviews.title: Not very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great looks good. Not the most user friendly menu and I have to manually connect my Bluetooth every time I turn the stereo on. I have always been a die hard Pioneer customer but I much prefer the Kenwood Exelon in my work vehicle, super user friendly and auto connects to my Bluetooth. Unless Pioneer remedies these issues my first choice will be Kenwood.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: This Is An Excellent Stereo to Run A Custom System.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new deck for an 8 speaker system, with a sub woofer and amplifier. This receiver works great for my custom sound system. I like the Bluetooth and the built in passive crossovers. I now have the best stereo on the block.
customer_reviews.author: Dickie Riggs

customer_reviews.title: All good sound, but app is not great
customer_reviews.text: All good sound, but app is not great. Does not open pandora, have to agree to open Spotify on the phone (iPhone 7) and also must press play on phone to start music for the first time when using iTunes on phone, otherwise everything else works really well. The sound paired with Rockford Fosgate punch 6.5 components is really really nice
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this stereo a lot. It does has its occasional glitches when working with bluetooth but works great otherwise. I use the USB, AUX, HD Radio, and bluetooth features with ease. The ARC app on android and apple work really well. The install was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla_Store

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and has a great many sound adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and has a great many sound adjustments. Plays Blue tooth with CD quality. Screen is Dot read out and menus are a little hard to navigate. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Handsfree Phone Feature Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio when "handsfree" law went into effect in GA, but that feature has been completely useless since the day I installed it. Yelling in the car is enough to barely be heard by the person on the other end of the line and no audio from their end comes through the speakers at all. Now "handsfree" means switching to speaker phone and using my seatbelt strap to hold the phone on my shoulder while I'm driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better sound and features. Worth the extra $ over the cheap china imports.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 3 months and only 2 negatives. 1) Yes, the display should be brighter, have it at 10, but needs to goto 15. 2) The volume knob is too easily pushed and enters the main menu when I just want to change volume. I wanted HD tuner, Radio Data System, and good audio menu for $100 max!
customer_reviews.author: Art McC 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful head unit, great quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the sound of this unit, is a little difficult to set up but I'll get through it. Thank you pioneer for making a wonderful product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent receiver!
customer_reviews.text: Love the upgrade! Sounds awesome! Fast shipping this is a great buy. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth functionality could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's okay... it works. I don't like it's bluetooth abilities. If I'm listing to the RADIO or CDs the bluetooth isn't active so it doesn't answer my phone.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. CD stopped working Unit overheats.
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked ok when first installed. Don’t buy it. The cd stopped working. Seems like thbinto overheats and then resets. Shuts off, then in 3 minutes restarts with clock at 12:00. Save your money for an alpine unit.
customer_reviews.author: tomh5

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great deck for the price. Made my speakers sound such much better over my old kenwood deck. It connects to my iPhone every time, sound quality is great. For the price and the options this deck has it's a steal. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amarscov

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the menu
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the menu, missing my previous unit with all the buttons. In fact we can't read the display in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: definitely better than my stock radio and all features work very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly, definitely better than my stock radio and all features work very nicely. Only giving it four stars due to the small delay before bluetooth registers and the weird thing it does when an amber alert comes in.
customer_reviews.author: SoulDragon

customer_reviews.title: Great radio.
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. Everything about it works and sounds great. I only buy pioneer radios and this one doesn't disappoint. Only thing I would change is putting a 1 button dimmer on it. One of my pioneers has it.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Christianson

customer_reviews.title: I like this stereo well enough
customer_reviews.text: I like this stereo well enough. For the money it's great and performed as advertised. I realize I should have gotten a double DIN stereo because I could have and the extra space below the stereo is not worth having a larger stereo interface, if that's the right word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: This deck is awesome. So easy to use. When you download the app along with it, so much more control.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Can't See the Display During the Day
customer_reviews.text: The unit is most excellent (Blue Tooth, Tuner, CD player, USB Port), however you can't see the display in the sun, which is most of the time I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B

customer_reviews.title: Great radio great features with special offers we got a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great radio great features with special offers we got a free XM tuner and installed it at the same time works great. Love this deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues!
customer_reviews.text: Onboard amp blew within 48 hours. Great sound while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: I lake the stereo..
customer_reviews.text: Very good stereo I go into buy one more sun..
customer_reviews.author: Francisco alcala

customer_reviews.title: Great sterei. Many features
customer_reviews.text: Good stereos lots of features. only downside is the display. too dim in sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: jorge garcia

customer_reviews.title: no problems and installs easily. wished it had more
customer_reviews.text: works as described. no problems and installs easily. wished it had more power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best head unit for the cost,
customer_reviews.text: What an upgrade from kenwood excelon 599 (which I have to send to a service center, all speakers channels except sub rcas went out after 3 months). Independent controls on all speakers, meaning all. Can adjust sub volume independently. Very helpful since I have a small enclosure under the seat of my 2012 ram 1500 crew cab. I thought I might have to add more power but now that I have this deck, I just crank the sub to whatever volume I want, for whatever genre of music I'm listening to. Built in Crossover works perfectly. I can save every input setting to sound how I want.
customer_reviews.author: CPT.HANDSOME

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade if not running amp.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and features for the money. Display could be better, and the 2v outs stink. But the features make up for that especially if your not planning on running a amp. It gets quite loud and stays clean paired with some RF coaxials. Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most important parts. Not a usable radio. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I just went to have the radio installed today and the installer couldn't install since the package was missing the wire harness and cage. The radio also has finger prints all over it. There is no plastic on the radio. This is a used radio I can't install or use. My mistake for not opening the package until a month later so I am out money and a radio. One star since I can't give less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop the press!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice head unit with a working remote. I do not use the internal power so I cannot comment on that. As a control center, it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charkley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and put it in his truck right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this radio after lots of research and was really excited about it but after receiving it and taking it to get installed on my 2006 Dodge Ram with infinity sound system it was going to be an extra $500 just to hook it all up since it was special setup. I can't afford that so I m trying to send the radio back but the seller wont cover shipping and is charging a 15% stocking fee. In my opinion that's not how a customer should be treated. I did not intentionally mis order this item. But anyway the radio looked really nice and I'm bummed out it wouldn't work for a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Wes D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This unit is completely garbage, don't waste your money on Pioneer crap!
customer_reviews.author: Lynell Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I am sure you can find something that is easier to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these for about a year. They do work, sort of. I wish they had a knob to change radio stations. Display is difficult to read in most conditions. Easy to push too many buttons and get lost during use. Button labels are impossible to read. Difficult to use while driving. I would not buy another one. The blue-tooth phone connection quit working on one, maybe just settings, but very difficult to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: it works great. It does take awhile to figure out the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works great. It does take awhile to figure out the menus. You can sync the display for when the vehicle lights are on and when they are off and both settings have a brightness adjust. Just set one when the lights are off and the other when the lights are on. I downloaded the Pioneer ARC app from the play store so I could use the blue tooth to play music from the phone and it works great. I had a Pioneer DEH-X5710HD and this plugged right in, the only extra thing was plugging in the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I've used older versions of this stereo and this upgrade is really nice. It works well in my daily driver VW bug. Haven't had a chance to use the pioneer app that controls it beucase I usually need two hands for driving, but I like the idea and hope to play with it more for sound adjustment while parked. Good sound and easy install. For the price, this is a nice upgrade for a poor factory receiver.
customer_reviews.author: cj-disco

customer_reviews.title: ... a low end single din unit i am very happy with its performance
customer_reviews.text: For a low end single din unit i am very happy with its performance. Nice x-over points for speaker settings, easy to navigate thru. I run a PRS-80 and love it. Great low budget HU and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brett B

customer_reviews.title: Great reciever, just one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall this receiver is great. The only problem is the Bluetooth is just weird at times. It doesn’t happen often but every once in a while the receiver just doesn’t connect or doesn’t work with my iPhone. Usually when you turn it off and back on it fixes itself.
customer_reviews.author: mkbuzz1

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is awful. Definitely not an upgrade from the 6600.
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth on this stereo is worse than the 6600 model that I had previously. It takes several tries to connect to my phone, pretty much every time I get in the car. Sometimes, all it says is Ready, and won't let me connect at all until I turn the car off and back on once or twice. I like the EQ and better mixing controls, and overall the deck sounds good, but if I hadn't passed my 30 day window to return it, I would have. I'll probably reinstall my 6600 and sell this one to some unsuspecting soul.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lorenski

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The radio has a great performance, the sound quality is awesome, a great interface, The links with smatrphone apps works very well, such as Spotify. It has a lot of equalization settings.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ramos Boone

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth function sucks
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth on this unit is absolute garbage. 80% of the time I have to turn the Jeep off and back on to get it to connect. This is the only pioneer unit I’ve ever had a problem with but something is wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old pioneer unit with this one because I use an android phone and this offered android capability. Figured I'd need to use Bluetooth but my phone worked right away via USB without having to download the pioneer app. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer X7800BHS is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love my new head unit! I like the fact I was able to track it down and everything! What I didn’t like is that I was a day late. Definitely going with the standard shipping next time
customer_reviews.author: Armando mata

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth and USB input works great. Easy to use equalizer and audio controls. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Raido.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stereo. It plays clear music. You can answer your phone while driving, without touching the raido. Hands free.
customer_reviews.author: david a cook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not turn on ones installed I’ve installed many stereo and this one must of been damaged. Got a different pioneer and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: But great receiver!
customer_reviews.text: Menus are a little hard to navigate. But great receiver!
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: My old Volvo never sounded as good!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup, sounds great. You'll need to upgrade your stock speakers.... well I had to anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Radio is great. A lot of features, easy to use and goes great with a system.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH EASY TO UNDERSTAND INSTRUCTIONS FROM MOUNTING TO PROGRAMMING, SOUNDS GREAT, LOOKS GREAT - NO ISSUES
customer_reviews.author: GeeCee

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best stereo I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best stereo I've ever owned. It has a s*** ton of features, some of which I have yet to mess with. I've had this for about a month and so far I'm happy with it. I will update if any issues come up.
customer_reviews.author: C_Milla

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is great! It has about any choices and extras that most Stereos don't have. the DEH 6900BT USB port is only for charging your Phone or Ipad etc. This one has USB music playback like most others, and has enough Enhanced features that it will take me a month to find all of them. One real good thing about the Pioneer DEH-X7800BHS is it is user friendly, I think this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Henry's Choice

customer_reviews.title: The unit sounds real good and the usb port allows me to listen to ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't own a phone so I can comment on Bluetooth or anything related to it. The unit sounds real good and the usb port allows me to listen to my music library and shuffle though the songs via remote.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: My DEH-X7800BHS worked great for two months
customer_reviews.text: My DEH-X7800BHS worked great for two months. Now it will intermittently decide when it wants to play sound. The radio always turns on but mostly with no sound. Then all of a sudden there is sound again. I've double checked all my wiring and its great. I re-installed the factory radio and all is great again. Glad I didn't toss it. Go figure my return window expired 20 days ago...
customer_reviews.author: David L Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: I love the stereo and you'll see plenty of other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the stereo and you'll see plenty of other reviews as to why it's so good. However, I feel like people should know that this headunit only supports SBC for bluetooth. Even though it can decode AAC/MP3 media, it will not support those codecs over bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: it started off great. has good sound and lots of options
customer_reviews.text: it started off great. has good sound and lots of options. BUT, the main reason i bought this radio was for blue tooth integration. blue tooth is horrible on this thing. i have a iphone 6 too. constantly tells me bt not connected. i even upgraded the firmware and none of these problems were fixed. oh and the pandora app is absolutely horrible. cannot change stations or anything from your phone. so once you connect to the receiver thats the only station that will play. buy something else i missed my 30 day window by 5 days cause i kept putting it off.
customer_reviews.author: ownerss

product_meta.title: Pioneer DEH-X7800BHS CD Receiver with Enhanced Audio Functions
product_meta.description: Pioneer DEH-X7800BHS CD Receiver with Enhanced Audio Functions
feature_bullets: Built-In Bluetooth for Hands-Free Calling and Wireless Audio Streaming
Spotify, Works with Pandora, SiriusXM- Ready
